author: bartosik-hep
body:
#### PR description:

Several bugs in Phase2 Tracker geometries `T33` and `T35` have been fixed:
 - 2 versions of the overlap fix introduced manually in #42951 replaced by the correct one from `tkLayout`
 - fixed wrong material budget in the dead area of split-sensor PXB modules

Consistency between the `CMSSW` and `tkLayout` implementations is now restored.

Relocated the overlap-checking script to the right location for being used in future geometry validations

#### PR validation:

 - Relevant packages compile
 - Four-muon workflows with geometry `D102`  run without issues
title: Phase2 Tracker: fixed geometries T33/T35
